snippet: A New Jersey court rules in favor of company proposing to build a headquarters in Englewood Cliffs that opponents say would disrupt the view of the Palisades.
abstract: A New Jersey court rules in favor of company proposing to build a headquarters in Englewood Cliffs that opponents say would disrupt the view of the Palisades.

headline.main: Judges Finds in Favor of Company Seeking to Build Headquarters Near the Palisades
headline.print_headline: LG Electronics Gets Judge’s O.K. for Building Plan
